LuaScript:
XmlInit = {}

ValidColors = {
     Blue=7,
     Orange=6,
     Green=5,
     Yellow=4,
     Red=3,
     Purple=2,
     White=1
}

PlayerReadyStatus = {}
TurnOrder = {"White", "Purple", "Red", "Yellow", "Green", "Orange", "Blue"}
HandZones = {
     ["3cd1b3"] = "White",
     ["b57286"] = "Purple",
     ["e22332"] = "Red",
     ["4579a4"] = "Yellow",
     ["a350d0"] = "Green",
     ["9ac6fd"] = "Orange",
     ["088bd4"] = "Blue",
}
CurrentPlayedCard = {}

function onSave()
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
     ScoreSheet = getObjectFromGUID("1b8ed7")
     XmlInit = self.UI.getXmlTable()

     populateStatusPanelUI()
end

function registerSingleObject(player, tag)
     for _, obj in pairs(getObjectsWithTag(tag)) do
          local owner = obj.getVar("owner")
          if owner == player then
               obj.setVar("owner", nil)
               obj.highlightOff()
               break
          end
     end
end

function onObjectDrop(player, object)
     if object.hasTag("Score") then
          if object.type == "Deck" then
               object.setVar("owner", nil)
               object.highlightOff()
               return
          end

          if #object.getZones() > 0 then return end

          -- register only one wonder per player
          if object.hasTag("Wonder") then
               registerSingleObject(player, "Wonder")
          elseif object.hasTag("Shipyard") then
               registerSingleObject(player, "Shipyard")
          end

          object.setVar("owner", player)
          if ScoreSheet.getVar("ShowHighlight") then
               object.highlightOn(player)
          end

          if CurrentPlayedCard[player] == object.getGUID() then
               PlayerReadyStatus[player] = true
               updatePlayerReadyStatusUI(player)
          end
     end
end

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, object)
     local zoneOwner = HandZones[zone.getGUID()]

     if object.hasTag("Score") and object.getVar("owner") then
          object.setVar("owner", nil)
          object.highlightOff()

          -- init if no entry
          if object.held_by_color and not CurrentPlayedCard[object.held_by_color] then
               CurrentPlayedCard[object.held_by_color] = nil
          end

          if object.type == 'Card' then
               object.clearButtons()

               if CurrentPlayedCard[zoneOwner] == object.getGUID() then
                    PlayerReadyStatus[zoneOwner] = false
                    updatePlayerReadyStatusUI(zoneOwner)
               end
          end
     end
end

function onObjectLeaveZone(zone, object)
     local zoneOwner = HandZones[zone.getGUID()]

     if object.type == 'Card' and object.held_by_color == zoneOwner then
          -- player has taken card of from own hand
          CurrentPlayedCard[zoneOwner] = object.getGUID()
     end
end

function getValidSeatedPlayers()
     SeatedPlayerCount = 0
     SeatedPlayers = {}

     if Turns.type == 1 then
          Turns.type = 2
          Turns.order = TurnOrder
     end

     for i=1, #TurnOrder do
          if Player[TurnOrder[i]].seated then
               SeatedPlayerCount = SeatedPlayerCount + 1
               SeatedPlayers[#SeatedPlayers + 1] = Player[TurnOrder[i]]
          end
     end
     return SeatedPlayers
end

function split(str, delimiter)
     local fields = {}

     local sep = delimiter or " "
     local pattern = string.format("([^%s]+)", delimiter)
     string.gsub(str, pattern, function(c) fields[#fields + 1] = c end)

     return fields
end

function uiSetVisibilityToPlayer(id, playerColor, visible)
     local attr = UI.getAttribute(id, "visibility")
     if visible then
          attr = attr .. "|" .. playerColor
     else
          local newAttr = ""
          tokens = split(attr, "|")

          for i=1, #tokens do
               if tokens[i] ~= playerColor then
                    newAttr = newAttr .. tokens[i] .. "|"
               end
          end

          if newAttr == "" then
               attr = "Black"
          else
               attr = newAttr:sub(1, newAttr:len() - 1)
          end
     end

     UI.setAttribute(id, "visibility", attr)
end

function showPanelClick(player)
     local vis = self.UI.getAttribute("statusPanel", "visibility")
     uiSetVisibilityToPlayer("statusPanel", player.color, not string.find(vis, player.color))
end

function closePanelClick(player)
     uiSetVisibilityToPlayer("statusPanel", player.color, false)
end

function onPlayerChangeColor(player_color)
     populateStatusPanelUI()
end

function populateStatusPanelUI()
     local players = getValidSeatedPlayers()
     local entries = {}

     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          if not PlayerReadyStatus[player.color] then
               PlayerReadyStatus[player.color] = false
          end

          local statusTxt = {
               tag            = "Text",
               value          = "",
               attributes     = {id = "statusTxt_" .. player.color, class="rdy"},
               children       = {}
          }

          local statusPanel = {
               tag            = "Panel",
               attributes     = {id = "statusBg_" .. player.color, color="Black"},
               children       = {statusTxt}
          }

          local statusCell = {
               tag            = "Cell",
               attributes     = {},
               children       = {statusPanel}
          }

          local playerNameTxt = {
               tag            = "Text",
               value          = player.steam_name or player.color,
               attributes     = {color = player.color, class = "name"},
               children       = {}
          }

          local playerNameCell = {
               tag            = "Cell",
               attributes     = {},
               children       = {playerNameTxt}
          }

          local row = {
               tag            = "Row",
               attributes     = {},
               children       = {statusCell, playerNameCell}
          }

          entries[#entries + 1] = row
     end

     XmlInit[4].children[1].children[3].children = entries
     self.UI.setXmlTable(XmlInit)

     -- must wait before we can update the UI
     Wait.frames(function()
          local panelH = 150
          local spacing = 5
          local rowH = 32

          if #players > 3 then
               self.UI.setAttribute("statusPanel", "height", panelH + (rowH + spacing) * (#players - 3))
          end

          for _, player in pairs(players) do
               updatePlayerReadyStatusUI(player.color)
          end
     end, 2)
end

function updatePlayerReadyStatusUI(playerColor)
     self.UI.setAttribute("statusBg_" .. playerColor, "color", PlayerReadyStatus[playerColor] and "Green" or "Red")
     self.UI.setValue("statusTxt_" .. playerColor, PlayerReadyStatus[playerColor] and "✔" or "✘")
end

function resetPlayerReadyStatus()
     local players = getValidSeatedPlayers()

     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          CurrentPlayedCard[player.color] = nil
          PlayerReadyStatus[player.color] = false
          updatePlayerReadyStatusUI(player.color)
     end
end

- Gain 7 victory points.

Side Night)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.Description:
Side Day)

- Gain 3 victory points.
- Gain your choice of 1 science symbol and add it to your collection of Green cards.
- Gain 7 victory points.

Side Night)

- You can play the last Age card of each Age, following the normal rules, instead of discarding it. This card is considered a new turn and is played after all other players have played their last card.
- Gain your choice of 1 science symbol and add it to your collection of Green cards.

local __bundle_require, __bundle_loaded, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules = (function(superRequire)
	local loadingPlaceholder = {[{}] = true}

	local register
	local modules = {}

	local require
	local loaded = {}

	register = function(name, body)
		if not modules[name] then
			modules[name] = body
		end
	end

	require = function(name)
		local loadedModule = loaded[name]

		if loadedModule then
			if loadedModule == loadingPlaceholder then
				return nil
			end
		else
			if not modules[name] then
				if not superRequire then
					local identifier = type(name) == 'string' and '\"' .. name .. '\"' or tostring(name)
					error('Tried to require ' .. identifier .. ', but no such module has been registered')
				else
					return superRequire(name)
				end
			end

			loaded[name] = loadingPlaceholder
			loadedModule = modules[name](require, loaded, register, modules)
			loaded[name] = loadedModule
		end

		return loadedModule
	end

	return require, loaded, register, modules
end)(nil)
__bundle_register("The Hanging Gardens of Babylon.1b7653.lua", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
require("SevenWonders/scienceSelector")
end)
__bundle_register("SevenWonders/scienceSelector", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
SelectedScience = ""

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, object)
    if object == self then
        self.UI.setAttribute("scienceSelect", "active", false)
    end
end

function onObjectDrop(player, object)
    if object == self and #object.getZones() <= 0 then
        self.UI.setAttribute("scienceSelect", "active", true)
    end
end

function symbolClicked(player, value, id)
    if value == "True" then
        SelectedScience = id
    else

ObjectStates.Name: Card
ObjectStates.Description:
At the end of the Age when this card enters play, before the Resolution of
Military Conflicts phase, choose one of the two following effects:
• Either the Military Conflict phase doesn’t happen at all and no players take any Military Victory or Defeat tokens.
• Or all players complete the Military Conflict phase twice.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
ShowHighlight = false
AutoScore = true

IndexOffset_Score = 11
IndexStart_Total = 77
IndexStart_Name = 84

QueueUpdate = false
UpdateTimeSnapshot = 0

function onload()
     self.createButton({
          click_function = 'toggleHighlightClick',
          function_owner = self,
          label = 'Highlight: Off',
          position = {-.64,0,1.1},
          width = 2200,
          height = 400,
          font_size = 300,
          scale = {0.1, 0.1, 0.1},
          tooltip = "Shows which cards and tokens will score for which player.\n\n(Based on last player to pick up object)"
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = 'toggleAutoScoreClick',
          function_owner = self,
          label = 'Auto Score: On',
          position = {-.15,0,1.1},
          width = 2200,
          height = 400,
          font_size = 300,
          scale = {0.1, 0.1, 0.1}
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = 'updateScoreClick',
          function_owner = self,
          label = 'Update',
          position = {.64,0,1.1},
          width = 2200,
          height = 400,
          font_size = 300,
          scale = {0.1, 0.1, 0.1},
          tooltip = "Calculate all players' scores."
     })

     local posXStart = -0.54
     local posXOffset = 0.205

     local posYStart = -0.72
     local posYOffset = 0.133
     for i=1, 7 do
          for j=1, 11 do
               self.createInput({
                    input_function = 'updateSum',
                    function_owner = self,
                    label = '---',
                    alignment = 3,
                    position = {posXStart+(posXOffset*(i-1)),0.15,posYStart+(posYOffset*(j-1))},
                    scale = {0.15,0.15,0.15},
                    width = 600,
                    height = 400,
                    font_size = 300,
                    color = {1,1,1,0},
                    font_color = {0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 100},
                    validation = 3
               })
          end
     end

     for i=1, 7 do
          self.createInput({
               input_function = 'none',
               function_owner = self,
               label = '----',
               alignment = 3,
               position = {posXStart+(posXOffset*(i-1)),0.15,0.75},
               scale = {0.2,0.2,0.2},
               width = 1200,
               height = 400,
               font_size = 300,
               color = {1,1,1,0},
               font_color = {0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 100},
               value = 0
          })
     end

     for i=1, 7 do
          self.createInput({
               input_function = 'none',
               function_owner = self,
               label = 'Name',
               alignment = 3,
               position = {posXStart+(posXOffset*(i-1)),0.15,-0.87},
               scale = {0.07,0.07,0.07},
               width = 1200,
               height = 400,
               font_size = 300,
               color = {1,1,1,0},
               font_color = {0.1,0.1,0.1,100},
          })
     end
end

function none()
end

function onObjectDrop(player_color, dropped_object)
     if AutoScore and dropped_object.hasTag("Score") and dropped_object.type ~= "Deck" then
          QueueUpdate = true
          UpdateTimeSnapshot = os.clock()
     end
end

function onObjectRotate(object, spin, flip, player_color, old_spin, old_flip)
     if AutoScore and (flip == 0 or flip == 180) then
          QueueUpdate = true
          UpdateTimeSnapshot = os.clock()
     end
end

function onUpdate()
     if QueueUpdate and AutoScore and os.clock() > UpdateTimeSnapshot + 1 then
          QueueUpdate = false
          updateScoreClick()
     end
end

function updateScoreClick()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, 'updateScoreCo')
end

function updateScoreCo()
     local validColors = Global.getVar("ValidColors")
     local playerColors = Global.getVar("TurnOrder")
     local players = Global.call("getValidSeatedPlayers")
     local scoreTally = {}

     -- init
     for _, color in pairs(playerColors) do
          scoreTally[color] = {
               scoreLater = {},    --cards to score on second pass
               exist = false,
               wonder = 0,
               wonderStagesBuilt = 0,
               wonderComplete = false,
               coins = 0,
               debt = 0,
               conflict1Count = 0,
               conflict2Count = 0,
               conflict3Count = 0,
               conflictVictoryTotal = 0,
               militaryDefeat = 0,
               navalVictoryTotal = 0,
               navalDefeat = 0,
               compass = 0,
               gear = 0,
               tablet = 0,
               Brown = 0,
               Gray = 0,
               Red = 0,
               Yellow = 0,
               Blue = 0,
               Green = 0,
               Black = 0,
               Purple = 0,
               White = 0,
               Island = 0,
               Blue_vp = 0,
               Yellow_vp = 0,
               Green_vp = 0,
               Purple_vp = 0,
               Black_vp = 0,
               White_vp = 0,
               Island_vp = 0,
               commerceLevel = 0,
          }
     end

     local vp = 0

     -- calculate stats for each player based on owned objects
     for _, obj in pairs(getObjectsWithTag("Score")) do
          local owner = obj.getVar("owner")
          local score = scoreTally[owner]
          if owner then
               score.exist = true

               if obj.hasTag("Coin") then
                    score.coins = score.coins + tonumber(obj.getDescription())
               elseif obj.hasTag("Debt") then
                    score.debt = score.debt + tonumber(obj.getDescription())
               elseif obj.hasTag("ConflictVictory") then
                    vp = tonumber(obj.getDescription())
                    if vp == 1 then
                         score.conflict1Count = score.conflict1Count + 1
                    elseif vp == 3 then
                         score.conflict2Count = score.conflict2Count + 1
                    elseif vp == 5 then
                         score.conflict3Count = score.conflict3Count + 1
                    end
                    score.conflictVictoryTotal = score.conflictVictoryTotal + vp
               elseif obj.hasTag("MilitaryDefeat") then
                    score.militaryDefeat = score.militaryDefeat + tonumber(obj.getDescription())
               elseif obj.hasTag("NavalVictory") then
                    score.navalVictoryTotal = score.navalVictoryTotal + tonumber(obj.getDescription())
               elseif obj.hasTag("NavalDefeat") then
                    score.navalDefeat = score.navalDefeat + tonumber(obj.getDescription())
               elseif obj.hasTag("Wonder") then
                    vp, score.wonderStagesBuilt, score.wonderComplete = scoreWonder(obj)
                    score.wonder = score.wonder + vp
               elseif obj.hasTag("Shipyard") then
                    score.commerceLevel = getArmadaCommerceLevel(obj)
                    score.Blue_vp = getArmadaBlueFleetVp(obj)
               elseif obj.type == 'Card' and not obj.is_face_down then
                    local cardData = card_db[obj.getName()]

                    if not cardData then
                         print(obj.getName() .. " not found in card db.")
                         goto skip
                    else
                         score[cardData.type] = score[cardData.type] + 1
                         
                         if cardData.vp then
                              local tag = cardData.type .. "_vp"
                              score[tag] = score[tag] + cardData.vp
                         end

                         if cardData.vpFlag then
                              score.scoreLater[#score.scoreLater + 1] = obj
                         end

                         if cardData.science then
                              local symbol = cardData.science
                              if symbol == "select" then  
                                   local selectedSymbol = obj.getVar("SelectedScience")
                                   if selectedSymbol ~= "" then
                                        symbol = selectedSymbol
                                   else
                                        goto skip
                                   end
                              elseif symbol == "most" or symbol == "swap" then
                                   score.scoreLater[#score.scoreLater + 1] = obj
                                   goto skip
                              end

                              score[symbol] = score[symbol] + 1
                         end
                    end
               end

               if obj.hasTag("ScienceSelect") then
                    local selectedSymbol = obj.getVar("SelectedScience")
                    if selectedSymbol ~= "" then
                         score[selectedSymbol] = score[selectedSymbol] + 1
                    else
                         goto skip
                    end
               end
          end

          ::skip::
     end

     -- second pass scoring
     for _, color in pairs(playerColors) do
          local score = scoreTally[color]
          local neighbors = {getLeftNeighbor(color, scoreTally), getRightNeighbor(color, scoreTally)}

          for _, card in pairs(score.scoreLater) do
               local cardData = card_db[card.getName()]
               local tag = cardData.type .. "_vp"
               local flag = cardData.vpFlag
               local vp = 0

               if flag == "COUNT_OWN" then
                    if not score[cardData.target] then print(cardData.target .. " target not found.") end
                    vp = score[cardData.target] * cardData.vpPer
               elseif flag == "COIN_OWN" then
                    vp = math.floor(score.coins / 3)
               elseif flag == "WONDER_COMPLETE" and score.wonderComplete then
                    vp = 7
               elseif flag == "BROWN_GRAY_PURPLE_OWN" then
                    vp = score.Brown + score.Gray + score.Purple
               elseif flag == "NEIGHBORS" then
                    for i=1, #neighbors do
                         vp = vp + scoreTally[neighbors[i]][cardData.target] * cardData.vpPer
                    end
               elseif flag == "MOST" then
                    local most = true
                    for i=1, #neighbors do
                         if score[cardData.target] <= scoreTally[neighbors[i]][cardData.target] then
                              most = false
                              break
                         end
                    end

                    if most then
                         vp = cardData.vpPer
                    end
               elseif flag == "MOST_COLOR" then
                    local colors = {"Blue", "Red", "Brown", "Gray", "Yellow", "Green", "Purple", "Black"}
                    local highestN = 0
                    for i=1, #colors do
                         highestN = math.max(score[colors[i]], highestN)
                    end
                    vp = highestN
               elseif flag == "COIN_NEIGHBORS" then
                    local coinTotal = 0
                    for i=1, #neighbors do
                         coinTotal = coinTotal + scoreTally[neighbors[i]].coins
                    end
                    vp = math.min(10, math.floor(coinTotal / 3))
               elseif flag == "WONDER_NEIGHBORS" then
                    for i=1, #neighbors do
                         vp = vp + scoreTally[neighbors[i]].wonderStagesBuilt
                    end
                    vp = vp + score.wonderStagesBuilt
               elseif flag == "SCIENCE_SET" then
                    vp = math.min(score.compass, math.min(score.tablet, score.gear)) * cardData.vpPer
               elseif flag == "COLOR_SET" then
                    local colors = {"Blue", "Red", "Brown", "Gray", "Yellow", "Green", "Purple"}
                    local lowestN = 100
                    for i=1, #colors do
                         lowestN = math.min(score[colors[i]], lowestN)
                    end
                    vp = lowestN * cardData.vpPer
               elseif flag == "VP_PER_MILITARY1" then
                    vp = score.conflict1Count * 2
               elseif flag == "VP_PER_MILITARY3" then
                    vp = score.conflict2Count * 3
               elseif flag == "VP_PER_MILITARY5" then
                    vp = score.conflict3Count * 4
               elseif flag == "VP_PER_MIL_VICTORY" then
                    vp = score.conflict1Count + score.conflict2Count + score.conflict3Count
               elseif flag == "BLUE_RED_GREEN_SET" then
                    vp = math.min(score.Blue, math.min(score.Red, score.Green)) * cardData.vpPer
               elseif flag == "ONLY_LEADER" then
                    if score.White == 1 then
                         vp = cardData.vpPer
                    end
               elseif flag == "NO_MILITARY_DEFEAT" then
                    if score.militaryDefeat == 0 then
                         vp = cardData.vpPer
                    end
               elseif flag == "MILITARY_PAIR" then
                    vp = math.floor(score.conflict1Count / 2) * 1
                    vp = vp + math.floor(score.conflict2Count / 2) * 3
                    vp = vp + math.floor(score.conflict3Count / 2) * 5
               elseif flag == "COMMERCE_LEVEL" then
                    vp = score.commerceLevel * cardData.vpPer
               end

               if cardData.science == "most" then
                    local symbols = {"compass", "tablet", "gear"}
                    local mostCount = -1
                    local mostSymbol = ""
                    for i=1, #symbols do
                         if score[symbols[i]] > mostCount then
                              mostCount = score[symbols[i]]
                              mostSymbol = symbols[i]
                         end
                    end

                    score[mostSymbol] = score[mostSymbol] + 1

                    goto skip
               elseif cardData.science == "swap" then
                    local source = card.getVar("SelectedSource")
                    local dest = card.getVar("SelectedDest")

                    if source ~= "" and score[source] > 0 then
                         score[source] = score[source] - 1
                         score[dest] = score[dest] + 1
                    end

                    goto skip
               end

               card.clearButtons()
               card.createButton({
                    click_function = "none",
                    function_owner = self,
                    width = 0,
                    height = 0,
                    label = vp .. " VP",
                    font_size = 80,
                    rotation = cardData.type == "Island" and {0, 90, 0} or {0, 0, 0},
                    position = cardData.type == "Island" and {0.65, 0.3, 1.1} or {-.85, 0.3, -1.2},
                    font_color = cardData.type == "White" and "Black" or "White"
               })

               score[tag] = score[tag] + vp

               ::skip::
          end
     end

     for _, color in pairs(playerColors) do
          local i = validColors[color]
          local score = scoreTally[color]
          local scoreIndexStart = (i-1) * IndexOffset_Score

          if score.exist then
               -- update name
               self.editInput({
                    index = IndexStart_Name + i - 1,
                    value = Player[color].steam_name or color
               })

               -- update wonder vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart,
                    value = score.wonder,
               })

               -- update coin + debt
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 1,
                    value = math.floor(score.coins / 3) + score.debt,
               })

               -- military vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 2,
                    value = score.conflictVictoryTotal + score.militaryDefeat
               })

               -- blue vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 3,
                    value = score.Blue_vp
               })

               -- yellow vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 4,
                    value = score.Yellow_vp
               })

               -- science vp
               local sets = math.min(score.compass, math.min(score.tablet, score.gear))
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 5,
                    value = sets * 7 + math.pow(score.compass, 2) + math.pow(score.tablet, 2) + math.pow(score.gear, 2)
               })

               -- purple vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 6,
                    value = score.Purple_vp
               })

               -- black vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 7,
                    value = score.Black_vp
               })

               -- leader vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 8,
                    value = score.White_vp
               })

               -- naval vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 9,
                    value = score.navalVictoryTotal + score.navalDefeat
               })

               -- island vp
               self.editInput({
                    index = scoreIndexStart + 10,
                    value = score.Island_vp
               })

               updateSum(self, color, nil, false)
          end
     end

     return 1
end

function updateSum(obj, player_clicker_color, input_value, selected)
     local sumIndex = 76

     local inputs = obj.getInputs()

     if selected == false then
          for i=1, 7 do
               local startIndex = (i - 1) * 11
               local score = 0
               for j=1, 11 do
                    if inputs[startIndex + j].value ~= '' and inputs[startIndex + j].value ~= '-' then
                         score = score + tonumber(inputs[startIndex + j].value)
                    end
               end

               obj.editInput({
                    index = sumIndex + i,
                    value = score
               })
          end
     end
end

function toggleHighlightClick()
     ShowHighlight = not ShowHighlight
     self.editButton({
          index = 0,
          label = "Highlight: " .. (ShowHighlight and "On" or "Off")
     })

     if ShowHighlight then
          startLuaCoroutine(self, "highlightOnCo")
     else
          startLuaCoroutine(self, "highlightOffCo")
     end
end

function toggleAutoScoreClick()
     AutoScore = not AutoScore

     if not AutoScore then
          QueueUpdate = false
     end
     
     self.editButton({
          index = 1,
          label = "Auto Score: " .. (AutoScore and "On" or "Off")
     })
end

function highlightOnCo()
     for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
          if obj.hasTag("Score") then
               local player = obj.getVar("owner")
               if player then obj.highlightOn(player) end
          end
     end
     return 1
end

function highlightOffCo()
     for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
          obj.highlightOff()
     end
     return 1
end

function wait(time)
     local start = os.time()
     repeat
         coroutine.yield(0)
     until os.time() > start + time
 end

function scoreWonder(wonder)
     local info = wonder_db[wonder.getName()]
     
     if not info then 
          print(wonder.getName() .. " not found in wonder db.")
          return 0
     end

     local vp = 0
     local stagesBuilt = 0
     local vpArr = wonder.is_face_down and info.nightVp or info.dayVp
     local castPoints = {1.3, 0, -1.3}

     if #vpArr ~= 3 then
          castPoints = wonder.is_face_down and info.nightPos or info.dayPos
     elseif wonder.is_face_down then
          castPoints[1] = -castPoints[1]
          castPoints[3] = -castPoints[3]
     end

     if not castPoints then
          print(wonder.getName() .. " missing cast points table.")
          return 0
     end

     for i=1, #castPoints do
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = wonder.positionToWorld({castPoints[i], (wonder.is_face_down and -1 or 1), 1.6}),
               direction = {0, -1, 0},
               max_distance = 2,
               --debug = true
          })

          for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
               if hit.hit_object.type == 'Card' and hit.hit_object.is_face_down then
                    vp = vp + vpArr[i]
                    stagesBuilt = stagesBuilt + 1
                    break
               end
          end
     end

     -- Check for possible buried leaders for scoring
     if wonder.hasTag("BuriedLeader") then
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = wonder.positionToWorld({wonder.is_face_down and -2.5 or 2.5, wonder.is_face_down and -1 or 1, 0}),
               direction = {0, -1, 0},
               max_distance = 2,
               --debug = true
          })

          for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
               if not hit.hit_object.is_face_down then goto skip end

               if hit.hit_object.type == 'Deck' then
                    for _, card in pairs(hit.hit_object.getObjects()) do
                         vp = vp + getBuriedLeaderVp(card.name)
                    end
               elseif hit.hit_object.type == 'Card' then
                    vp = vp + getBuriedLeaderVp(hit.hit_object.getName())
               end

               ::skip::
          end
     end

     return vp, stagesBuilt, stagesBuilt >= #castPoints
end

function getBuriedLeaderVp(cardName)
     local info = card_db[cardName]
     if info.type == "White" then
          if info.cost < 0 then
               return 6
          else
               return info.cost * 2
          end
     end
     return 0
end

function getLeftNeighbor(playerColor, scoreTable)
     local validColors = Global.getVar("ValidColors")
     local turnOrder = Global.getVar("TurnOrder")
     local playerIndex = validColors[playerColor]
     for i=1, #turnOrder-1 do
          local ind = playerIndex + i
          if ind > 7 then ind = ind - 7 end
          if scoreTable[turnOrder[ind]].exist then
               return turnOrder[ind]
          end
     end

     -- no neighbor found
     return playerColor
end

function getRightNeighbor(playerColor, scoreTable)
     local validColors = Global.getVar("ValidColors")
     local turnOrder = Global.getVar("TurnOrder")
     local playerIndex = validColors[playerColor]
     for i=1, #turnOrder-1 do
          local ind = playerIndex - i
          if ind <= 0 then ind = ind + 7 end
          if scoreTable[turnOrder[ind]].exist then
               return turnOrder[ind]
          end
     end

     -- no neighbor found
     return playerColor
end

function getArmadaCommerceLevel(armadaBoard)
     local startInd = 8
     local indCount = 6
     local sp = armadaBoard.getSnapPoints()
     local level = {0,1,1,2,2,3,4}

     for i=startInd, startInd + indCount do
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = armadaBoard.positionToWorld({sp[i].position[1], sp[i].position[2] - 0.2, sp[i].position[3]}),
               direction = {0, 1, 0},
               max_distance = 1
          })

          if #hits > 0 and hits[1].hit_object.hasTag("FleetToken") then
               return level[i - startInd + 1]
          end
     end

     return 0
end

function getArmadaBlueFleetVp(armadaBoard)
     local startInd = 15
     local indCount = 6
     local sp = armadaBoard.getSnapPoints()
     local vp = {0,1,2,4,6,8,10}

     for i=startInd, startInd + indCount do
          local hits = Physics.cast({
               origin = armadaBoard.positionToWorld({sp[i].position[1], sp[i].position[2] - 0.2, sp[i].position[3]}),
               direction = {0, 1, 0},
               max_distance = 1
          })

          if #hits > 0 and hits[1].hit_object.hasTag("FleetToken") then
               return vp[i - startInd + 1]
          end
     end

     return 0
end

require("SevenWonders/scienceSelector")

SelectedSource = ""
SelectedDest = "compass"

function onload()
    self.UI.setXml([[<Defaults>
    <Text fontStyle="Bold" fontSize="30" alignment="MiddleLeft" color="#000000"/>
    <ToggleButton padding="10" colors="White|Blue|#4444AA|Yellow"/>
</Defaults>

<Panel id="scienceSelect" position="0 50 -30" width="200" height="300" rotation="0 0 180" scale="0.5">
    <VerticalLayout>
        <Text>Replace</Text>
        <ToggleGroup allowSwitchOff="true">
            <HorizontalLayout>
                <ToggleButton id="sourceCompass" onValueChanged="sourceClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="compass" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
                <ToggleButton id="sourceTablet" onValueChanged="sourceClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="tablet" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
                <ToggleButton id="sourceGear" onValueChanged="sourceClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="gear" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
            </HorizontalLayout>
        </ToggleGroup>
        <Text>With</Text>
        <ToggleGroup>
            <HorizontalLayout>
                <ToggleButton id="destCompass" onValueChanged="destClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="compass" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
                <ToggleButton id="destTablet" onValueChanged="destClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="tablet" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
                <ToggleButton id="destGear" onValueChanged="destClick"><Panel padding="3"><Image image="gear" preserveAspect="True"/></Panel></ToggleButton>
            </HorizontalLayout>
        </ToggleGroup>
    </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>]])
end

function sourceClick(player, value, id)
    if value == "True" then
        if id == "sourceCompass" then
            SelectedSource = "compass"
        elseif id == "sourceTablet" then
            SelectedSource = "tablet"
        elseif id == "sourceGear" then
            SelectedSource = "gear"
        end
    else
        SelectedSource = ""
    end
end

function destClick(player, value, id)
    if value == "True" then
        if id == "destCompass" then
            SelectedDest = "compass"
        elseif id == "destTablet" then
            SelectedDest = "tablet"
        elseif id == "destGear" then
            SelectedDest = "gear"
        end
    end
end
end)
__bundle_register("SevenWonders/scienceSelector", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
SelectedScience = ""

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, object)
    if object == self then
        self.UI.setAttribute("scienceSelect", "active", false)
    end
end

function onObjectDrop(player, object)
    if object == self and #object.getZones() <= 0 then
        self.UI.setAttribute("scienceSelect", "active", true)
    end
end

function symbolClicked(player, value, id)
    if value == "True" then
        SelectedScience = id
    else
        SelectedScience = ""
    end
end
end)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
At the end of the Age, continue to the Resolution of Military Conflicts with your two neighbors, but also with the player who gave you the Boarding token, following the normal rules.

Once the Military Conflicts are resolved, discard the Boarding token and put it
back in the reserve

Clarifications:
- You can be the target of two Boardings in the same Age.
In this case, you must resolve 4 Military Conflicts at the end of this Age.
- Diplomacy tokens (Cities and Leaders expansions) have no effect on Boardings.
All Boardings must be resolved.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
With this token, during the Resolution of Military Conflicts, you do not participate in Conflicts. You do not take any Conflict tokens (neither Defeat nor Victory). Your neighbors are therefore considered to be adjacent to each other and their militaries will enter conflict following the normal 7 Wonders rules.

You are required to use the Diplomacy token during the Military Conflict of
the same round you acquired it, even if your military strenght is higher than
your neighbors’. Discard the Diplomacy token after you use it.

Clarification: You can accumulate multiple Diplomacy tokens, but you are required to discard 1 Diplomacy token at the end of each Resolution of Military
Conflicts.

If there are ever only 2 players participating in the Resolution of Military Conflicts, they only face each other once and only take a single Military Conflict token each.

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
BaseDecks_GUID = {
     ["age1"]= {'501ae8', '9b51a7', '6123d4', 'bf52e6', 'a5a6ee'},
     ["age2"]= {'8e40b9', '1a8f31', 'e96ff5', '912d26', '453cee'},
     ["age3"]= {'88f04b', '92c03a', 'b0035e', 'c2a4ea', '864847'}
}

CitiesDecks_GUID = {"c840d2", "25f6ed", "5093d8"}
CitiesTokenBag_GUID={"b1f5a1", "ed2335", "ff17ba"}
CitiesTokenPlacement = {{5.50, 0.94, 4.50}, {7.50, 0.94, 4.50}, {12.00, 0.94, 2.00}}

LeadersDecks_GUID = {"fc3a1f", "901994", "c7db56", "4b61c7"}
LeadersDeckPlacement = {-0.50, 2, -4}

ArmadaDecks_GUID = {
     ["set1"] = {"f25817", "0b8af1", "2551e4"},
     ["set2"] = {"9ff3dd", "31282a", "18e419"},
     ["islands"] = {"24bcd7", "facd0e", "d99d0e"}
}
ArmadaTokenBag_GUID = {"a30549", "1a1373", "8dcae9", "82878d", "4cb023", "9ca312", "dd7fca", "511867"}
ArmadaTokenPlacement = {
     {15.00, 0.94, 0.00},
     {17.00, 0.94, 0.00},
     {19.00, 0.94, 0.00},
     {21.00, 0.94, 0.00},
     {15.00, 0.94, 2.00},
     {17.00, 0.94, 2.00},
     {19.00, 0.94, 2.00},
     {21.00, 0.94, 2.00}
}
ArmadaDeckPlacement = {{-10.50, 2, 4.50}, {-10.50, 2, 0.50}, {-10.50, 2, -3.50}}
ShipTokens_GUID = {
     ["red"] = "0eef1f",
     ["yellow"] = "10eb0f",
     ["blue"] = "e75093",
     ["green"] = "b230fd"
}

ScoreSheetPlacement = {53.15, 10.84, 0.00}
ScoreSheetRotation = {57.11, 270.02, 0.01}

CoinBag_GUID ={"3f95a5", "3cad45", "9e60c9"}
MilitaryTokenBag_GUID={"c56b5a", "5411ef", "c8fc52", "d6e612"}
CoinPlacement = {{-3.50, 0.94, 4.50}, {-0.50, 0.94, 4.50}, {2.50, 0.94, 4.50}}
MilitaryTokenPlacement = {{8.00, 0.94, 0.00}, {10.00, 0.94, 0.00}, {12.00, 0.94, 0.00}, {10.00, 0.94, 2.00}}
MainDeckPlacement = {{-4.50, 2, 0.50}, {-0.50, 2, 0.50}, {3.50, 2, 0.50}}

GuildDeck = getObjectFromGUID("a5b1c7")
WondersBag = getObjectFromGUID("56d45b")
DockyardBag = getObjectFromGUID("5b9a9c")

CitiesExp = false
LeadersExp = false
ArmadaExp = false
UsePromo = false

function onLoad()
     onPlayerChangeColor()

     MainDecks = {}
     for i=1,3 do
          MainDecks[i] = getObjectFromGUID(BaseDecks_GUID["age" .. i][1])
     end

     ScoreSheet = getObjectFromGUID('1b8ed7')
end

function onPlayerChangeColor()
     SeatedPlayerCount = 0

     for _, player in pairs(Player.getPlayers()) do
          if Global.getVar("ValidColors")[player.color] then
               SeatedPlayerCount = SeatedPlayerCount + 1
          end
     end

     self.UI.setValue("playerCountLabel", "Players: " .. SeatedPlayerCount)
end

function startGameClick()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "startGameCo")
     self.destruct()
end

function startGameCo()
     local shuffleDecks = {}

     if UsePromo then
          GuildDeck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("0840f6"))
          if CitiesExp then
               GuildDeck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("c10a9d"))
          end
          if LeadersExp then
               getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[1]).putObject(getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[4]))
          end
     end

     -- expansion setups
     if CitiesExp then
          WondersBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("508a61"))
          WondersBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("e5a814"))

          local n = math.max(3, SeatedPlayerCount)
          for i=1, #CitiesDecks_GUID do
               local deck = getObjectFromGUID(CitiesDecks_GUID[i])
               deck.shuffle()

               for j=1, n do
                    MainDecks[i].putObject(deck.takeObject())
               end
          end
     end

     if LeadersExp then
          WondersBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("7ab0fb"))
          WondersBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("366fce"))

          local leadersDeck = getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[1])
          leadersDeck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[2]))

          if CitiesExp then
               leadersDeck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[3]))
          end
     end

     if ArmadaExp then
          WondersBag.putObject(getObjectFromGUID("22d26c"))

          if SeatedPlayerCount >= 4 then
               for i=1, 3 do
                    local deck = getObjectFromGUID(ArmadaDecks_GUID["set1"][i])
                    deck.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(ArmadaDecks_GUID["set2"][i]))

                    deck.shuffle()
               end
          end

          wait(0.2)

          local n = math.max(3, SeatedPlayerCount)

          for i=1, 3 do
               for j=1, n do
                    local deck = getObjectFromGUID(ArmadaDecks_GUID["set1"][i])
                    MainDecks[i].putObject(deck.takeObject())
               end
          end
     end

     if SeatedPlayerCount >= 4 then
          for i=2, SeatedPlayerCount-2 do
               if SeatedPlayerCount > 7 then
                    break
               end

               for j=1, #MainDecks do
                    MainDecks[j].putObject(getObjectFromGUID(BaseDecks_GUID["age"..j][i]))
               end
          end
     end

     -- guild deck
     GuildDeck.shuffle()
     for i=1, math.max(3, SeatedPlayerCount) + 2 do
          MainDecks[3].putObject(GuildDeck.takeObject())
          wait(0.05)
     end

     -- place token bags
     for i=1, #CoinBag_GUID do
          local bag = getObjectFromGUID(CoinBag_GUID[i])
          bag.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
          bag.setPositionSmooth(CoinPlacement[i])
          bag.setLock(true)
          wait(0.1)
     end

     for i=1, #MilitaryTokenBag_GUID do
          local bag = getObjectFromGUID(MilitaryTokenBag_GUID[i])
          bag.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
          bag.setPositionSmooth(MilitaryTokenPlacement[i])
          bag.setLock(true)
          wait(0.1)
     end

     if CitiesExp then
          for i=1, #CitiesTokenBag_GUID do
               local bag = getObjectFromGUID(CitiesTokenBag_GUID[i])
               bag.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
               bag.setPositionSmooth(CitiesTokenPlacement[i])
               bag.setLock(true)
               wait(0.1)
          end
     end

     if ArmadaExp then
          for i=1, #ArmadaTokenBag_GUID do
               local bag = getObjectFromGUID(ArmadaTokenBag_GUID[i])
               bag.setRotation({0,0,0})
               bag.setPositionSmooth(ArmadaTokenPlacement[i])
               bag.setLock(true)
               wait(0.1)
          end
     end

     wait(0.5)

     -- place cards
     for i=1, #MainDecks do
          MainDecks[i].setPositionSmooth(MainDeckPlacement[i])
          shuffleDecks[#shuffleDecks + 1] = MainDecks[i]
          wait(0.1)
     end

     if ArmadaExp then
          for i=1, #ArmadaDecks_GUID["islands"] do
               local deck = getObjectFromGUID(ArmadaDecks_GUID["islands"][i])
               deck.setPositionSmooth(ArmadaDeckPlacement[i])
               shuffleDecks[#shuffleDecks + 1] = deck
               wait(0.1)
          end
     end

     getObjectFromGUID("6b0428").setPositionSmooth({9.98, 1.04, -3.14})

     if LeadersExp then
          local deck = getObjectFromGUID(LeadersDecks_GUID[1])
          deck.setPositionSmooth(LeadersDeckPlacement)
          shuffleDecks[#shuffleDecks + 1] = deck
     end

     wait(1)

     for i=1, #shuffleDecks do
          shuffleDecks[i].shuffle()
     end

     WondersBag.shuffle()
     DockyardBag.shuffle()

     local coinBag = getObjectFromGUID(CoinBag_GUID[1])
     local seatedPlayers = Global.call("getValidSeatedPlayers")
     for _, player in pairs(seatedPlayers) do
          local hand = player.getHandTransform(1)
          local pos = hand.position
          local forward = hand.forward
          local right = hand.right
          local wonderPos = {0, 0, 0}
          local relRot = {hand.rotation[1], hand.rotation[2] + 180, hand.rotation[3]}

          for i=1, 3 do
               wonderPos[i] = pos[i] + forward[i] * 12
          end
          wonderPos[2] = 1

          local board = WondersBag.takeObject({
               position = wonderPos,
               rotation = relRot,
               smooth = false
          })

          board.setVar("owner", player.color)

          -- place armada board
          if ArmadaExp then
               local dockPos = {wonderPos[1] + right[1] * 8, 1, wonderPos[3] + right[3] * 8}
               local dock = DockyardBag.takeObject({
                    position = dockPos,
                    rotation = relRot,
                    smooth = false,
                    callback_function = function(x)
                         x.setVar("owner", player.color)
                         x.setLock(true)
                    end
               })

               local sp = dock.getSnapPoints()
               local col = {"red", "yellow", "blue", "green"}
               for i=1, 4 do
                    local pos = sp[(i-1) * 7 + 1].position
                    getObjectFromGUID(ShipTokens_GUID[col[i]]).takeObject({
                         position = dock.positionToWorld({pos[1], pos[2] + 3, pos[3]}),
                         rotation = dock.getRotation()
                    })
               end 
          end

          local coins = 3

          if LeadersExp then
               coins = 6
          end

          for i = 1, 3 do
               wonderPos[i] = wonderPos[i] + right[i] * -7
          end

          for i=1, coins do
               local coin = coinBag.takeObject({
                    position = {wonderPos[1] + forward[1] * 0.2 * (i-1), wonderPos[2] + forward[2] * 0.2 * (i-1), wonderPos[3] + forward[3] * 0.2 * (i-1)}
               })

               coin.setVar("owner", player.color)
          end
     end

     ScoreSheet.setPositionSmooth(ScoreSheetPlacement)
     ScoreSheet.setRotationSmooth(ScoreSheetRotation)
     ScoreSheet.setLock(true)

     --coinBag.deal(3)

     return 1
end

function toggleCitiesClick()
     CitiesExp = not CitiesExp
     if CitiesExp then
          self.UI.setValue("citiesCheckBoxLabel", "✓")
     else
          self.UI.setValue("citiesCheckBoxLabel", "")
     end
end

function toggleLeadersClick()

end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function onload()
     self.createButton({
          click_function = "passLeftClick",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 1500,
          height = 900,
          font_size = 300,
          label = "Pass Left",
          rotation = {0, 0, 0},
          position = {-0.3, 1, 0},
          scale = {0.1, 0.1, 0.3},
          tooltip = "Passes cards to the player on your left."
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "passRightClick",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 1500,
          height = 900,
          font_size = 300,
          label = "Pass Right",
          rotation = {0, 0, 0},
          position = {0.3, 1, 0},
          scale = {0.1, 0.1, 0.3},
          tooltip = "Passes cards to the player on your right."
     })
end

function passLeftClick()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "passLeftCo")
end

function passRightClick()
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "passRightCo")
end

function passRightCo()
     local players = Global.call("getValidSeatedPlayers")
     local handObjects = {}

     for i=1, #players do
          local handObjs = players[i].getHandObjects(1)
          handObjects[players[i].color] = handObjs
     end

     for i=#players, 1, -1 do
          local next = i - 1
          if next <= 0 then
               next = #players
          end

          for _, obj in pairs(handObjects[players[i].color]) do
               --obj.deal(1, players[next].color)
               local trans = players[next].getHandTransform()
               obj.setPosition(trans.position)
               obj.setRotation({
                    trans.rotation[1],
                    trans.rotation[2] + 180,
                    trans.rotation[3]
               })
          end
          --wait(0.05)
     end

     Global.call("resetPlayerReadyStatus")
     return 1
end

function passLeftCo()
     local players = Global.call("getValidSeatedPlayers")
     local handObjects = {}

     for i=1, #players do
          local handObjs = players[i].getHandObjects(1)
          handObjects[players[i].color] = handObjs
     end

     for i=1, #players do
          local next = i + 1
          if next > #players then
               next = 1
          end

          for _, obj in pairs(handObjects[players[i].color]) do
               --obj.deal(1, players[next].color)
               local trans = players[next].getHandTransform()
               obj.setPosition(trans.position)
               obj.setRotation({
                    trans.rotation[1],
                    trans.rotation[2] + 180,
                    trans.rotation[3]
               })
          end
          --wait(0.05)
     end

     Global.call("resetPlayerReadyStatus")
     return 1
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end
